biography.value: A faint humanoid shape shows in a fire elementalâ€™s capricious devastation. Wherever it moves, it sets its surroundings ablaze, turning the world to ash, smoke, and cinders.

description.value:
The &Reference[elemental]{elemental} makes two touch attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=fire average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the &Reference[fire]{fire}, the target takes [[/damage 1d10 type=fire average=true]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

&Reference[fire]{Fire} Form. The &Reference[elemental]{elemental} can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the &Reference[elemental]{elemental} or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage 1d10 type=fire average=true]] damage. In addition, the &Reference[elemental]{elemental} can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes [[/damage 1d10 type=fire average=true]] damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the &Reference[fire]{fire}, the creature takes [[/damage 1d10 type=fire average=true]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

changes.value:
turn=start,
damageRoll=1d10,
damageType=fire,
label=Fire Form (Start of Turn)

description.value:
Illumination. The &Reference[elemental]{elemental} sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Water Susceptibility. For every 5 feet the &Reference[elemental]{elemental} moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes [[/damage 1 cold average=false]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
